short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and restore open Chrome tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Close Chrome tabs in peace!

In one click, consolidate and save all of your currently opened Chrome tabs into a single "workspace".

Have all of your tabs for a given workspace auto-opened in one click by selecting one of your saved workspaces.

Each workspace you create will be saved across Chrome sessions and can be launched at any time.
